languages.text: "Эти шрамы — ерунда. Я ношу куда более страшные отметины на сердце своем. Они — моя вера".
"These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."
languages.original_text: "Эти шрамы — ерунда. Я ношу куда более страшные отметины на сердце своем. Они — моя вера".

traits.locale_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “那些伤疤都是小事。我的心中有更加可怕的伤痕，它们都是我的信仰。”
languages.original_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."

traits.locale_text: “那些伤疤都是小事。我的心中有更加可怕的伤痕，它们都是我的信仰。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「こんな傷は、些細なものです。私の心はにもっと深い傷跡が残っています。これは私の信念です」
languages.original_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな傷は、些細なものです。私の心はにもっと深い傷跡が残っています。これは私の信念です」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Estas cicatrices no son nada. Llevo marcas mucho más terribles en mi corazón. Son mi fe».
languages.original_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."

traits.locale_text: «Estas cicatrices no son nada. Llevo marcas mucho más terribles en mi corazón. Son mi fe».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Diese Narben sind nichts. Auf meinem Herzen trage ich viel schlimmere Spuren. Sie sind mein Glaube."
languages.original_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Narben sind nichts. Auf meinem Herzen trage ich viel schlimmere Spuren. Sie sind mein Glaube."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Ces marques ? Ce ne sont que des broutilles. Mon cœur est bien plus meurtri. C'est de là que me vient ma foi. »
languages.original_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."

traits.locale_text: « Ces marques ? Ce ne sont que des broutilles. Mon cœur est bien plus meurtri. C'est de là que me vient ma foi. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Bu yara izleri önemsiz. Kalbimde çok daha korkunç izler taşıyorum. Onlar benim inancım."
languages.original_text: "These scars are trifles. I bear much more terrible marks upon my heart. They are my faith."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yara izleri önemsiz. Kalbimde çok daha korkunç izler taşıyorum. Onlar benim inancım."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
